1.text: Rinse the strawberries under cool water.

2.text: Pick the green top stems off every strawberry.

3.text: Poke the tip of a paring knife into the top on the outside of the white part.

4.text: Slide the knife around the white part to cut out the hull.

5.text: Cut strawberries in half if you want larger pieces for a quick snack.

6.text: Slice strawberries into quarters if you want smaller pieces for fruit salad.

7.text: Cut strawberries into vertical slices if you want thinner pieces for toppings.

8.text: Make a V shape in the top before slicing the strawberry to get heart shapes.

9.text: Leave the green stems on before slicing to create a fan-like design.

10.text: Cut petal-shaped slices into the outside of a strawberry to make it into a rose.
